title: Chromas

embed.description: Snag your favorites for 2000 IP per chroma. Chromas that are overdue for an Early Sale will also be available for 195 RP each. Check out the breakdown below. We'll smooth out this process so that moving forward, chromas will join Early Sales first and then have an IP sale.

body: Hello guys i am an EUNE player and i got a question. Why i can't buy Arcade Miss Fortune's chromas cause on that link that i put here it shows us "IP Sale (2000 IP per chroma)" at mf. Please answer ..

replies.body: Arcade Miss Fortune's chromas should be available for IP with the upcoming sale.  Chroma IP sales are not activated just yet, though.  Per the site you linked, the sale will go live around 11 Pacific.  Hang on for just a few more hours!
I thought that once the chromas went on sale they would keep going on sale? how come none of the skins from last sale are on sale?
